languages.text: {n}Девушка берется за кисть и следующие полчаса вы проводите за светской беседой. Смущение и неловкость вскоре сменяются сосредоточенностью — она поглощена процессом.{/n}
{n}Cassia picks up her brush. The two of you spend the next half hour engaged in small talk, and her awkwardness soon gives way to an intense focus as she becomes immersed in her art.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Девушка берется за кисть и следующие полчаса вы проводите за светской беседой. Смущение и неловкость вскоре сменяются сосредоточенностью — она поглощена процессом.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia picks up her brush, and the two of you spend the next half hour engaged in small talk. Her awkwardness soon gives way to focus as she becomes immersed in the process.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia picks up her brush. The two of you spend the next half hour engaged in small talk, and her awkwardness soon gives way to an intense focus as she becomes immersed in her art.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia prend son pinceau. Son embarras initial laisse bientôt place à une concentration intense, et vous passez la demi-heure qui suit à discuter pendant qu'elle s'adonne à son art.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia picks up her brush. The two of you spend the next half hour engaged in small talk, and her awkwardness soon gives way to an intense focus as she becomes immersed in her art.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia prend son pinceau. Son embarras initial laisse bientôt place à une concentration intense, et vous passez la demi-heure qui suit à discuter pendant qu'elle s'adonne à son art.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia coge su pincel. Pasáis media hora charlando, pero, según se pierde en su arte, su incomodidad da paso a una intensa concentración.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia picks up her brush. The two of you spend the next half hour engaged in small talk, and her awkwardness soon gives way to an intense focus as she becomes immersed in her art.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia coge su pincel. Pasáis media hora charlando, pero, según se pierde en su arte, su incomodidad da paso a una intensa concentración.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}卡西娅拿起了她的画笔。在接下来的半个小时里，你和她简短地聊了几句。她的尴尬之情很快就被专心致志的艺术创作取代，整个人沉浸在绘画的世界中。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia picks up her brush. The two of you spend the next half hour engaged in small talk, and her awkwardness soon gives way to an intense focus as she becomes immersed in her art.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}卡西娅拿起了她的画笔。在接下来的半个小时里，你和她简短地聊了几句。她的尴尬之情很快就被专心致志的艺术创作取代，整个人沉浸在绘画的世界中。{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}カシアがブラシを拾い上げた。それから30分、二人は世間話に花を咲かせる。彼女のぎこちなさがやがて集中力へと変わり、芸術に没頭していった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia picks up her brush. The two of you spend the next half hour engaged in small talk, and her awkwardness soon gives way to an intense focus as she becomes immersed in her art.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}カシアがブラシを拾い上げた。それから30分、二人は世間話に花を咲かせる。彼女のぎこちなさがやがて集中力へと変わり、芸術に没頭していった。{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia nimmt ihren Pinsel in die Hand. Ihr zwei verbringt zwar die nächste halbe Stunde mit Plaudereien, und ihre Verlegenheit weicht bald einem intensiven Fokus. Sie verliert sich in ihrer Kunst.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia picks up her brush. The two of you spend the next half hour engaged in small talk, and her awkwardness soon gives way to an intense focus as she becomes immersed in her art.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia nimmt ihren Pinsel in die Hand. Ihr zwei verbringt zwar die nächste halbe Stunde mit Plaudereien, und ihre Verlegenheit weicht bald einem intensiven Fokus. Sie verliert sich in ihrer Kunst.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia, fırçasını eline alıyor. Sonraki yarım saati önemsiz şeylerden konuşarak geçiriyorsunuz ve Cassia'nın bir süre sonra gerginliği azalıyor, yoğun bir şekilde sanatına odaklanmaya başlıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia picks up her brush. The two of you spend the next half hour engaged in small talk, and her awkwardness soon gives way to an intense focus as she becomes immersed in her art.{/n}
